name: formhub
body:
### About
formhub is a free hosted service that makes data collection simple and collaborative.

*Simple*. All you need to get started is an account on formhub and the ability to author .xls files. Absolutely no technical setup required.
*Collaborative*. Share your data collection forms in Excel. Find, grab and modify other peoples' forms and quickly deploy it. Publish gathered data to share it with others via Excel, CSV, KML or an interactive map.
*Mobile*. formhub works seemlessly with ODK Collect a robust and proven data collection platform for Android.

### Contribute
* Join the [formhub developers google group](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/formhub-dev). 
* Submit and track [open issues](https://github.com/modilabs/formhub/issues)
* Contribute code and Submit a pull request!

### Authors and Contributors
formhub is actively being developed by the Modi Research Group at Columbia University.  We are actively looking for platforms to contribute to this platform.
tagline: hub for your mobile data collection needs
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
